description: An application made to court for judicial decision.  May be standalone or linked to a case

received_date.description: The date that the application was received by HMCTS

application_reference.description: The human readable reference for the application.  For linked applications this will be the case urn or the prosecution authority reference suffixed with a numerical sequence.  This is generated by the backend APIs and therefore is set optional, however a reference is required by the time the application is listed

respondents.description: The parties answering to a matter before the court
